name: BlackFace (Black Facebook)
description:
BlackFace (09-01-17 Update) - Pure Facebook news feed, no left or right sidebars, no ads, no chat tab at the bottom, a simple white centered text on black background, and the news feed widened to fill where the ads were.

https://i.imgur.com/dESyJmF.png
https://i.imgur.com/3gbhWim.png
